name: Fugit (Skycer)
description:
This is my submission for the Getta Game Jam 8. 

Hardmode: No words. Submitted 21 hours early

Inspired on a dream I had a while ago. 

In it, I was a painting and I was able to move along the wall I was hanging from.  Since I'm let's say... terrible outisde  pixel art, I decided to resort to top notch proffesionals (Van Gogh, Picasso, Velazquez, Munch ... )

Movement: WASD as usual

Objective: Survive as long as you can, Death is nearby so you better run.  As it may happen in life, you will start to go slower as time passes by.

Tip: Get as many youth pills (shiny things) as you can to increase your speed

Attribution of paintings to their respective authors (links included in the application)
